Authors: Elargo A.R., Gamiri B., Jodin G.P., Atmojo R.N.P., Lie Y.
Title: Design of byod food ordering and delivery application system at padang food restaurant
Source title: Far East Journal of Electronics and Communications
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, West-Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Elargo, A.R., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, West-Jakarta, Indonesia; Gamiri, B., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, West-Jakarta, Indonesia; Jodin, G.P., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, West-Jakarta, Indonesia; Atmojo, R.N.P., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, West-Jakarta, Indonesia; Lie, Y., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, West-Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Ordering food and drink through the web and mobile applications is popular in several large fast food restaurants in Indonesia. However, what about the food ordering process at the Padang restaurant? The mechanism is still conventional, and of course, it will lead to inefficiency in their dish processing cycle. Often we encounter many Padang dishes unsold in a day. Also, the food is re-heated again, which is very dangerous for health, especially when the food contains coconut milk base. Through the development of bring your own device (BYOD) application, it is expected to improve several processes on food ordering, table reservation, payment, and delivery at Padang food restaurant chains. Then these processes can be done easily and improve work efficiency of the company. © 2017 Pushpa Publishing House, Allahabad, India.
Author Keywords: Bring your own device (BYOD) concept; Food ordering and delivery application system; Padang food; Software development; Web based application
References: Satzinger, J.W., Jackson, R.B., Burd, S.D., (2012) Systems Analysis and Design in A Changing World, , 6th ed., Course Technology, Boston; Turban, E., King, D., Lee, J., Liang, T.-P., Turban, D., (2015) Electronic Commerce: A Managerial and Social Networks Perspective, pp. 561-596. , Electronic Commerce 8th ed., Springer International Publishing; Bansal, G., Zahedi, F.M., Gefen, D., The impact of personal dispositions on information sensitivity, privacy concern and trust in disclosing health information online (2010) Decis. Support Syst., 49 (2), pp. 138-150; Disterer, G., Kleiner, C., BYOD bring your own device (2013) Procedia Tech., 9, pp. 43-53; Lennon, R.G., Bring your own device (BYOD) with cloud 4 education (2012) SPLASH'12, Proceedings of the 3rd Annual Conference on Systems, Programming, and Applications: Software for Humanity, p. 171
